snippet: The Labor Department said applications fell by 6,000, to 357,000, continuing a trend that raises expectations for more hiring.
abstract: Labor Department says initial claims for state unemployment benefits fell 6,000 to a seasonally adjusted 357,000, lowest level since April 2008; trend raises expectations for more hiring.
lead_paragraph: The Labor Department said applications fell by 6,000, to 357,000, continuing a trend that raises expectations for more hiring.

headline.seo: New Jobless Claims at Lowest Level Since 2008
